General.Name: Xingye Leather Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Xingye Leather Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides leather materials in China. It offers nappa leather, natural wrinkle leather, and special effect leather series that are used in the furniture industry, leather apparel and luggage industry, and other fields. The company sells leather for shoe uppers, bags, and furniture, as well as provides military leather and special functional leather. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, China.
